scamsTips.label: Lost passport
scamsTips.content: Contact your embassy immediately. Tourist Police can help with paperwork.

scamsTips.label: Theft
scamsTips.content: File a report at the nearest police station (commissariat). Get a copy for insurance.

scamsTips.label: Common scams
scamsTips.content: Fake guides, "closed today" redirections, henna ambushes, carpet shop detours.

scamsTips.label: Prevention
scamsTips.content: Keep valuables hidden, use inside pockets, be wary of unsolicited help.
